sentence: Sen. Thom Tillis announced Wednesday that he was endorsing state Sen. Chuck Edwards' campaign to defeat freshman Rep. Madison Cawthorn in the May 17 Republican primary for North Carolina's 11th District, saying the next day that the incumbent has fallen well short of the most basic standards Western North Carolina expects from their representatives.? Tillis threw in an unsubtle reference to Cawthorn's previous attempt to leave his constituents behind to run for an even more conservative district in the Charlotte area that he barely represented before a new court-drawn map foreclosed that possibility, antics that likely did him far more damage at home than his litany of embarrassing behavior.
title: North Carolina senator endorses effort to deny renomination to Madison Cawthorn in May

sentence: This week on The Downballot, cohosts David Beard and David Nir covered a lot of ground: Elections this past week in Wisconsin and California An interesting turn of events in the Pennsylvania Senate race, where the Democratic primary race went negative for the first time Madison Cawthorn and why Republicans are finally turning against him Important European elections that have taken place recently or are coming up on the docket very soon Beard and Nir also spoke to guest Ali Lapp, founder of House Majority PAC, the largest Democratic super PAC that is devoted to helping Democrats win House races nationwide.
title: Highlights from The Downballot: House Majority PAC and Democrats fight to hold Congress

sentence: At one point during the call, Lisa Wiggins, who was a caseworker for the 26-year-old first-term representative in his district office for over a year, described that office as having more liquor bottles than they do water bottles.? Cawthorn's office insinuated that the allegations, made in a secretly recorded and released conversation with the head of an anti-Cawthorn PAC, were politically motivated, and hinted at potential counteraction by saying that they constitute defamation of character.? Wiggins unloaded about Cawthorn in a call with David Wheeler, the president of the anti-Cawthorn American Muckrakers PAC more commonly known as Fire Madison Cawthorn, accusing him of denying me my FMLA? leave when her uncle died and her husband suffered a heart attack the same week.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Secretly recorded call adds to controversy swirling around Cawthorn

sentence: Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading scheme,? reports Anna Kaplan: Tillis said in a tweet insider trading by a member of Congress is a serious betrayal of their oath,? adding that Cawthorn owes North Carolinians an explanation.? The Examiner reports Cawthorn was pictured at an event on December 29 with James Koutoulas, one of the people behind the Let's Go Brandon? cryptocurrency, which is named after the viral chant insulting President Joe Biden.
author: Zach Everson
title: Checks & Imbalances: McCarthy's Money, Cawthorn's Crypto, Truth Social's Triumph

It pains us to post it but in the public and voters interest we chose to do so,? the group said, just above an all-caps link urging viewers to WATCH THE VIDEO OF REPUBLICAN CONGRESSMAN MADISON CAWTHORN DRY HUMPING SOMEONE'S HEAD AND MOANING LOUDLY HERE.?
